remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承 和接口的类 提供 当前 HTTP 请求的对象的引用。Classes that inherit the and interfaces are provided a reference to an object for the current HTTP request. 对象提供对请求的内部 、 和属性的访问 。The object provides access to the intrinsic , , and properties for the request. > [!IMPORTANT] > 完成后，此对象可用于垃圾回收 。This object is ready for garbage collection when the is completed. 请求完成后，其使用可能导致未定义的行为，例如 。Its usage after the request completes could lead to undefined behavior, such as a . > > 此对象仅在由 ASP.NET 控制的线程中可用。This object is only available in the thread controlled by ASP.NET. 后台线程中的使用情况可能导致未定义的行为。Usage in background threads could lead to undefined behavior. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问和显示对象的属性 。The following example demonstrates how to access and display properties of the object. 使用对象的属性访问当前 HTTP 请求的上下文 。The context of the current HTTP request is accessed by using the property of the object. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，此值指示 ASP.NET 请求处理过程中是否允许非预期的异步操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.

value.span: 当异步 API 在不是预期的时间使用时 ASP.NET 将引发异常，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志未设置为 `true` ，则当 ASP.NET 检测到应用程序滥用异步 API 时，将引发异常。If this flag is not set to `true`, ASP.NET will throw an exception when it detects the application misusing the async API. 如果尝试在请求处理管道的一部分中调用异步方法，但异步操作不是预期的，或者异步模块或处理程序信号完成时仍未完成的异步工作，则可能会发生这种情况。This can occur if you try to call an asynchronous method during a part of the request processing pipeline where asynchronous operations are not expected, or if there is still outstanding asynchronous work when an asynchronous module or handler signals completion. 此行为旨在作为一种安全网络，让您在编写不适合预期模式并可能产生负面影响的异步代码时提前了解。This behavior is meant as a safety net to let you know early on if you're writing async code that doesn't fit expected patterns and might have negative side effects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的当前正在执行的处理程序 可能不同于属性所引用的处理程序 。The currently executing handler that is referenced by the property might be different than the handler that is referenced by the property. 如果通过使用方法或方法请求其他处理程序，则可能会发生这种情况 。This can occur when another handler was requested by using the method or the method. 当当前正在执行的处理程序完成处理时，将还原以前确定的处理程序。When the currently executing handler finishes processing, the previously determined handler is restored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性需要中的集成管道模式 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] ，并且至少 .NET Framework 版本3.0。The property requires the integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0. 如果可用，属性将返回一个 值。When available, the property returns a value. 属性的值 指示 实例中当前正在处理请求的事件。The value of the property indicates which event in the instance is currently processing the request. 不应设置属性。The property is not intended to be set. 相反，它是在 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 处理 ASP.NET 管道中的请求的过程中设置的。Instead, it is set by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] during the processing of the request in the ASP.NET pipeline. 设置 属性将导致编译错误。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定处理当前请求的对象的哪个事件正在 处理。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine what event of the object that is handling the current request is being processed. 在此示例中，事件处理程序处理对象的多个事件 ， 属性决定为正在处理的每个事件调用的代码。In the example, the event handler handles several events of the object, and the property determines what code is invoked for each event being handled. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification/CS/App_Code/TestModule.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification/VB/App_Code/TestModule.vb#1)]

span.span: The operation requires integrated pipeline mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含对处理 HTTP 请求的处理程序的引用。The property contains a reference to the handler that processes the HTTP request. 可以使用 [httpHandlers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bya7fh0a(v=vs.100)) 元素或在用户代码中定义的自定义处理程序来指定处理程序。The handler can be specified by using the [httpHandlers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bya7fh0a(v=vs.100)) element, or by using a custom handler defined in user code. 有关处理程序的详细信息，请参阅 [Http 处理程序和 Http 模块概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398986(v=vs.100))。For more information about handlers, see [HTTP Handlers and HTTP Modules Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb398986(v=vs.100)). 即使在服务器端方法（如 方法或方法）更改了当前页后，对属性的引用也将保持不变 。The reference to the property will remain the same even after the current page has been changed by a server-side method, such as the method or the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅在中集成模式下受支持 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] ，且至少 .NET Framework 3.0。The property is only supported with the integrated mode in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] and at least the .NET Framework 3.0. 如果可用，属性将返回一个布尔值，该值指示对象中的事件是否 已完成处理。When available, the property returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an event in the object has finished processing. 不应设置属性。The property is not intended to be set. 相反，它由提供 [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] 给每个通知的 ASP.NET 运行时。Instead, it is provided by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to the ASP.NET runtime for each notification. 设置 属性将导致编译错误。Setting the property will result in a compilation error. 在一个事件处理程序处理对象的多个事件的方案中 ，可以将 属性与枚举结合使用 来准确确定当前请求在应用程序生命周期中的位置。In scenarios where multiple events of the object are handled by one event handler, you can use the property in combination with the enumeration to precisely determine where in the application lifecycle the current request is. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来确定对象的事件何时 处理完所有关联的事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine when an event of the object has finished processing all the associated event handlers. 此示例中的自定义事件处理程序处理对象的多个事件 ，而 属性用于确定在处理特定事件之后调用的代码。The custom event handler in this example handles several events of the object, and the property is used to determine what code is invoked after a specific event is handled. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification/CS/App_Code/TestModule.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpResponse.IsPostNotification/VB/App_Code/TestModule.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对类的属性和方法的编程访问 。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 由于 ASP.NET 页包含对 包含) 类 (命名空间的默认引用 ，因此可以 在不使用对的完全限定类引用的情况下引用 .aspx 页上的成员 。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，你可以使用 `Request.Browser` 获取客户端浏览器的功能。For example, you can use `Request.Browser` to get the capabilities of the client browser. 但是，如果你想要 从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块使用的成员，则必须 在模块中包括对命名空间的引用，以及对当前活动的请求/响应上下文和 你要使用的中的类的完全限定引用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中，必须指定完全限定的名称 `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser` 。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Request.Browser`. > [!NOTE] > 如果在对象不可用时尝试使用此属性，ASP.NET 将引发异常 。ASP.NET will throw an exception if you try to use this property when the object is not available. 例如，在 global.asax 文件的 Application_Start 方法中，或从 Application_Start 方法调用的方法中，这种情况都是如此。For example, this would be true in the Application_Start method of the Global.asax file, or in a method that is called from the Application_Start method. 此时，尚未创建 HTTP 请求。At that time no HTTP request has been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对类的属性和方法的编程访问 。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 由于 ASP.NET 页包含对 包含) 类 (命名空间的默认引用 ，因此可以 在不使用对的完全限定类引用的情况下引用 .aspx 页上的成员 。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，可以使用 `Response.Write("some output")` 将输出写入 HTTP 输出流。For example, you can use `Response.Write("some output")` to write output to an HTTP output stream. 但是，如果要 从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块使用的成员，则必须在模块中包括对命名空间的引用， 并包含对当前活动的请求/响应上下文以及要使用的类的完全限定引用 。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中，必须指定完全限定的名称 `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")` 。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Response.Write("some output")`.

span.span: Rewrites the URL using the given path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将对 资源的请求重定向到的路径不同于所请求 URL 指示的路径。The method redirects a request for a resource to a different path than the one that is indicated by the requested URL. 如果必须重置虚拟路径，以便服务器资源的客户端请求正确解析，请使用此方法的重载，该重载采用 `rebaseClientPath` 参数并将参数设置为 `false` 。If you have to reset the virtual path so that requests from the client for server resources resolve correctly, use the overload of this method that takes the `rebaseClientPath` parameter and set the parameter to `false`. 如果要在 Web 应用程序中重构页面，并且想要确保具有书签的旧 Url 的用户仍可以在移动页面后使用这些页面，则 URL 重写非常有用。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写使你能够以透明方式将请求转发到新的页面位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果要使站点能够使用更易于用户理解并经过优化搜索引擎的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 路由](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来 允许网站响应不反映网站中的文件结构的 url。The following example shows how to use the method to enable a Web site to respond to URLs that do not reflect the file structure in the Web site. 第一个代码块是名为 RewritePath 的 ASP.NET 网页。The first block of code is an ASP.NET Web page that is named RewritePath.aspx. 它需要查询字符串。It requires a query string. 如果你的网站的名称为 WebSite1，则 URL 会 `http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1` 在浏览器中显示 "第1页"。If the name of your site is WebSite1, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/RewritePath.aspx?page=1` displays "Page 1" in the browser. Web 页面后的代码块是 `Application_BeginRequest` global.asax 文件中的事件处理程序。The block of code that follows the Web page is the `Application_BeginRequest` event handler in the Global.asax file. 此代码会截获对 Url （如）的请求 `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` ，并将它们转换为 RewritePath 在处理之前所需的形式。This code intercepts requests for URLs such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` and converts them to the form that is required for RewritePath.aspx before they are processed. 因此，该 URL 将 `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` 调用 RewritePath，并在浏览器中显示 "第1页"。Therefore, the URL `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` invokes RewritePath.aspx with the query-string parameter that displays "Page 1" in the browser. 如果收到 URL （如） `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` ，则会调用的重载，以便 提供属性的值 和查询字符串参数。If a URL such as `http://localhost/WebSite1/page1` is received, an overload of is invoked that enables you to provide a value for the property as well as a query string parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/rewritepath.aspx#2)] [!code-csharp[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[HttpContext_RewritePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpContext_ReWritePath/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 方法调用，且 `rebaseClientPath` 参数设置为 `true` 。The method is called by the method with the `rebaseClientPath` parameter set to `true`. 若要确保未修改用于构造资源路径的虚拟路径，请将 `rebaseClientPath` 参数设置为 `false` 。To ensure that the virtual path that is used to construct paths to resources is not modified, set the `rebaseClientPath` parameter to `false`. 通常情况下，你可能想要将设置 `rebaseClientPath` 为，这 `false` 是你需要重写 URL，并使用主题并将 URL 重定向到与所请求的资源位于不同文件夹中的资源时。A common scenario in which you might want to set `rebaseClientPath` to `false` is when you need to rewrite the URL, and you are using themes and redirecting the URL to a resource located in a different folder than the requested resource. 如果要在 Web 应用程序中重构页面，并且想要确保具有书签的旧 Url 的用户仍可以在移动页面后使用这些页面，则 URL 重写非常有用。URL rewriting is useful when you want to restructure the pages in your Web application, and you want to make sure that people who have bookmarked old URLs can still use them after you have moved pages. URL 重写使你能够以透明方式将请求转发到新的页面位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果要使站点能够使用更易于用户理解并经过优化搜索引擎的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 路由](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参阅 方法重载。For a code example, see the method overload.

URL 重写使你能够以透明方式将请求转发到新的页面位置。URL rewriting enables you to transparently forward requests to the new page location. 如果要使站点能够使用更易于用户理解并经过优化搜索引擎的 Url，更可靠的替代方法是使用 ASP.NET 路由。If you want to enable a site to use URLs that are more user-friendly and are optimized for search engines, a more robust alternative is to use ASP.NET routing. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 路由](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 有关代码示例（包括此方法重载的示例），请参阅 方法重载。For a code example, including an example of this method overload, see the method overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对类的属性和方法的编程访问 。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the class. 由于 ASP.NET 页包含对 包含) 类 (命名空间的默认引用 ，因此可以 在不使用对的完全限定类引用的情况下引用 .aspx 页上的成员 。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，您可以使用在 `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` 服务器上创建 COM 对象的实例。For example, you can use `Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` to create an instance of a COM object on the server. 但是，如果你想要 从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块使用的成员，则必须 在模块中包括对命名空间的引用，以及对当前活动的请求/响应上下文和 你要使用的中的类的完全限定引用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中，必须指定完全限定的名称 `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")` 。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.Server.CreateObject("MyCOMComponent")`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在使用属性实现协作取消的处理程序和模块中 ，你可能希望禁用在请求超 时时 ASP.NET 默认执行的行为。如果将此属性设置为， `false` 则可帮助您确保在不中断 ASP.NET 的情况下运行取消和清理例程。In handlers and modules that are using the property to implement cooperative cancellation, you might wish to disable the behavior that ASP.NET performs by default when a request times out. Setting this property to `false` can help you make sure that cancellation and cleanup routines will run without being interrupted by ASP.NET. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则在发生超时时，ASP.NET 不会自动显示 "请求超时" 错误页。If you set this property to `false`, ASP.NET will not automatically display a "Request timed out" error page when a timeout occurs. 应用程序负责正确设置响应内容。The application is responsible for setting the response content appropriately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对接口的属性和方法的编程访问 。The property provides programmatic access to the properties and methods of the interface. 由于 ASP.NET 页包含对 包含) 类 (命名空间的默认引用 ，因此可以 在不使用对的完全限定类引用的情况下引用 .aspx 页上的成员 。Because ASP.NET pages contain a default reference to the namespace (which contains the class), you can reference the members of on an .aspx page without using the fully qualified class reference to . 例如，可以使用 `User.Identity.Name` 获取当前进程正在其上运行的用户的名称。For example, you can use `User.Identity.Name` to get the name of the user on whose behalf the current process is running. 但是，如果你想要 从 ASP.NET 代码隐藏模块使用的成员，则必须 在模块中包括对命名空间的引用，以及对当前活动的请求/响应上下文和 你要使用的中的类的完全限定引用。However, if you want to use the members of from an ASP.NET code-behind module, you must include a reference to the namespace in the module and a fully qualified reference to both the currently active request/response context and the class in that you want to use. 例如，在代码隐藏页中，必须指定完全限定的名称 `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name` 。For example, in a code-behind page you must specify the fully qualified name `HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过属性访问当前用户的属性 。The following example shows how to access properties of the current user through the property. 这些属性用于设置网页标题。Those properties are used to set the title of the Web page. 如果应用程序使用 Windows 身份验证，则用户名将包括域。If the application uses Windows authentication, the user name includes the domain. 例如，页标题为 "域 \ 用户名的主页"。For example, the page title would be "Home page for DOMAIN\username".
